about_the_game:
DISCOVER YOUR PATH

Explore distinct biomes, each with its own unique challenges and opportunities for strategic decision-making. Delve into sub-biomes, encounter diverse enemies, and forge your path through a treacherous landscape.

Will you be able to survive the arid deserts, eerie swamps and frigid mountains?

BRING YOUR BASE CAMP WITH YOU

Survival is paramount, and resource management is key.

Unleash your inner Western Pioneer by growing and customizing your Base Camp.

Bring it along on your journey, establishing a sanctuary amidst the untamed frontier.

Gather resources, upgrade your camp, and make it a haven in this hostile world.

MASTER THE ART OF GUN FIGHT

Engage in thrilling battles using ranged weapons and throwables. Take aim at your adversaries, using your skills to overcome the challenges that await.

Stay alert, as a bounty hangs over your head, constantly regulating the game's difficulty. The higher the bounty, the greater the challenges you'll face.

Will you rise to the occasion and prove your mettle?

HANDCRAFT YOUR TOOLKIT

Gather, craft, and consume resources to manage your health, hunger, thirst, and temperature.

Make wise choices and prioritize your actions as you navigate this unforgiving world.

Can you keep your wits about you and survive the dangers that lurk around every corner?

Are you ready to take on the untamed frontier? Prepare yourself for an unforgettable adventure in Dino Path Trail!

Add Dino Path Trail to your Steam Wishlist today and join us on this extraordinary journey. The untamed frontier awaits your arrival.

Are you prepared to survive?

content_descriptors.notes: In the world of Dino Path Trail, your survival in the Old Wild West hinges on your skill in engaging in fierce firearm battles. Within each unique biome, you will face thrilling encounters as you confront a diverse array of adversaries, including dinosaurs and notorious bandit gangs.

name: Dino Path Trail Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 | R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7- 7700k | Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 980 | R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Journey across a Wild West full of dangers where dinosaurs never faced extinction.Battle elements, evade predators, and confront cunning bandits to save your sister.Conquer the untamed frontier, or become prey in this exciting Survival Roguelike!
